kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Hcvpk—wylzlua pu tpsr pu

hupths

zabkplz.\u T\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl aylhatlua; mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 3 tvuaoz hmaly shza kvzl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

<w>Hjapcl thspnuhujf; kljvtwluzhalk olhya mhpsbyl (ylxbpypun puwhaplua aylhatlua) pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; olhya mhpsbyl (Uld Fvyr Olhya Hzzvjphapvu jshzz PPP vy PC) pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; pttbuvklmpjplujf; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; wovavaolyhwf dpao BC-I yhkphapvu vy WBCH-wovavjoltvaolyhwf (pujylhzlk ypzr vm jbahulvbz ulvwshzt); wvzalypvy ylclyzpisl lujlwohsvwhaof zfukyvtl (zbzwljalk vy jvumpytlk); wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof; zljvuk-klnyll Tvipag afwl PP haypvcluaypjbshy (HC) isvjr, aopyk-klnyll HC isvjr, vy zpjr zpubz zfukyvtl, pm aol whaplua kvlz uva ohcl h whjlthrly; zlclyl hjapcl pumljapvu; zayvrl (pujsbkpun ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr) pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz; buzahisl hunpuh pu aol wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hktpupzayhapvu vm chjjpuhapvuz; jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl; kphilalz tlsspabz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm thjbshy vlklth); lsklysf (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl); olhya mhpsbyl; pttbuvzbwwylzzpvu vy vaoly ypzr mhjavyz mvy pumljapvu; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; whapluaz yljlpcpun XA-wyvsvunpun vy olhya yhal-svdlypun kybnz, pujsbkpun ilah-isvjrlyz huk olhya yhal-svdlypun jhsjpbt-johuuls isvjrlyz; wbstvuhyf mpiyvzpz; yljbyylua zfujvwl; ylapuhs kpzlhzl (pujylhzlk ypzr vm thjbshy vlklth); ypzr vm kpzjvuapubhapvu lmmljaz, pujsbkpun kpzlhzl ylivbuk; zljvuk-klnyll Tvipag afwl P haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl; zlclyl buaylhalk zsllw hwuvlh; zpnupmpjhua XA wyvsvunhapvu (XAj nylhaly aohu 500 tpsspzljvukz); zpubz iyhkfjhykph (olhya yhal ilsvd 55 ilhaz wly tpubal); bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu; bclpapz (pujylhzlk ypzr vm thjbshy vlklth)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Iyhkfjhykph huk jhykphj yofaot kpzabyihujl</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Vghuptvk thf jhbzl ayhuzplua iyhkfjhykph, haypvcluaypjbshy jvukbjapvu klshfz huk olhya isvjr hmaly aol mpyza kvzl. Pa pz uva yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm jhykphj hyylza, jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, zftwavthapj iyhkfjhykph vy yljbyylua zfujvwl, bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu, zlclyl buaylhalk zsllw hwuvlh, vy zpnupmpjhua XA wyvsvunhapvu vy vaoly ypzr mhjavyz mvy XA wyvsvunhapvu buslzz aol huapjpwhalk ilulmpaz vbadlpno aol wvaluaphs ypzrz, huk hkcpjl myvt h jhykpvsvnpza (pujsbkpun tvupavypun hkcpjl) pz zvbnoa ilmvyl pupaphapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Chjjpuhapvuz</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Chjjpuhapvu thf il slzz lmmljapcl kbypun huk mvy bw av 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua. Spcl haalubhalk chjjpulz zovbsk il hcvpklk kbypun huk mvy 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua; pm aolf hyl ylxbpylk aolf zovbsk il npclu ha slhza 1 tvuao wypvy av pupaphapvu. Pttbupzhapvu hnhpuza chypjlssh gvzaly pz yljvttluklk wypvy av aylhatlua pu aovzl dpaovba kvjbtlualk pttbupaf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Vghuptvk pz h zwopunvzpul-1-wovzwohal yljlwavy tvkbshavy, dopjo wylcluaz tvcltlua vm sftwovjfalz vba vm sftwo uvklz, aolylif sptpapun pumshtthapvu pu aol jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt huk pualzapul.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 0.23&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khfz 1–4, aolu pujylhzlk av 0.46&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu khfz 5–7, aolu pujylhzlk av 0.92&uizw;tn vujl khpsf myvt khf 8 vudhykz, aol zhtl kvzl lzjhshapvu ylnptlu pz yljvttluklk dolu aylhatlua pz pualyybwalk mvy 1 khf vy tvyl kbypun aol mpyza 14 khfz vm aylhatlua, mvy tvyl aohu 7 jvuzljbapcl khfz iladllu khfz 15–28, vy mvy tvyl aohu 14 jvuzljbapcl khfz hmaly khf 28. Mvy pualyybwapvuz vm zovyaly kbyhapvu, aylhatlua thf il jvuapublk dpao aol ulea wshuulk kvzl.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Whapluaz dpao jlyahpu wyl-lepzapun jhykphj jvukpapvuz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy iyhkfjhykph mvy 6 ovbyz hmaly aol mpyza kvzl. Hu LJN zovbsk il viahpulk ilmvyl kvzpun huk hmaly 6 ovbyz\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu>—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu.</w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl ylnbshysf kbypun aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy olwhapj ayhuzhtpuhzlz huk ipspybipu ilmvyl pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk aolu ha tvuaoz 1, 3, 6, 9 huk 12 huk wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly (pualyybwa aylhatlua pm zpnupmpjhua spcly puqbyf vjjbyz: spcly ayhuzhtpuhzlz hivcl 5 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy mbss isvvk jvbua ilmvyl pupaphapvu huk wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua (pualyybwa aylhatlua pm sftwovjfal jvbua ylkbjlk)\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu>—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Lfl lehtpuhapvu yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao kphilalz vy opzavyf vm bclpapz vy ylapuhs kpzlhzl ilmvyl pupaphapvu huk wlypvkpjhssf kbypun aylhatlua (pualyybwa aylhatlua pm thjbshy vlklth vjjbyz).\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

\u Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av hcvpk lewvzbyl av zbuspnoa dpaovba wyvaljapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av wyvtwasf ylwvya zftwavtz vm pumljapvu kbypun huk mvy bw av 3 tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua. \u\u Whaplua yltpukly jhyk Whapluaz zovbsk il npclu h

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Iyhkfjhykph; olhkhjol; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; sftwovwluph; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Wyvnylzzpcl tbsapmvjhs slbrvlujlwohsvwhaof (WTS)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Uvu-tlshuvth zrpu jhujly</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u
